transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Haan ji, good afternoon.
Executive: Ji ji, main Preeti baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Okay, ek minute mam, main baat karwata hu madam se.
Executive: Ek minute sun lijiye sir, ek minute aapse bhi kaam tha. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ek minute sir ko de denge please.
Customer: Sir, ek minute bas.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir, ek minute aapse bhi baat karni thi mujhe, main baad mein unse continue kar lungi. Main ye kehna chah rahi thi sir, subah aapne call ki thi shayad, toh concern open hua tha, meri shayad aapne subah aapse baat bhi hui thi.
Customer: Accha, woh toh leads ke regarding hui thi na?
Executive: Haan, haan, toh woh concern open ho gaya tha sir. Actually mein maine abhi call ki hai ki aap abhi account main handle karungi aapka. Pehle koi aur karte the, Ashiwaji the shayad koi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Abhi main handle, ab main handle karungi, aapki new account manager main hu, Preeti naam hai sir mera.
Customer: Okay, okay, koi baat nahi mam.
Executive: Theek hai, toh aap, aapka jaise hi matlab sign hua tha mujhe profile, toh aapka concern direct turant hi open ho gaya sir. Aapne hume call kiya tha toh turant concern open tha, toh kya main ye concern close kar du?
Customer: Uh, mam, kyunki karwa loon main iske, ab ye karwa ke sath main lunch kar raha tha. Fir main iske regarding aapse baat karta hu. Ab thoda sa inko jo catalog.
Executive: Haan, woh main guide kar deti hu. Aapke kya naam hai us manager ka?
Customer: Unka naam hai Surender Kaur.
Executive: Surender Kaur. Theek hai, aap unko call de dijiye, main ek bari video meet pe guidance dena chahungi aur ye 752 kiska number hai sir?
Customer: 752, uh, ye I think mere father ke paas hai number.
Executive: Accha, sir ye wale number pe na 23rd ko aapko ek accounting app, accounting app choose karna hota hai, Vyapar ya Light Keeping.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 23rd November ko subah 9:00 baje ek message aaya hoga WhatsApp pe sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, aap usko please choose kar lijiye jo bhi aapko chahiye. Matlab aaj 23rd November subah 9:00 baje aaya hoga. Aap chahe date likh lijiye agar aapko yaad na rahe toh.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, main kar leta hu, main kar leta hu. Main khol nikal ke.
Executive: Ji, ji. Toh ye bhi ek part hai, ji bilkul. Hamare paas bilkul sir, main ye actually mein ye bhi part tha mujhe batana tha ye cheez ki Vyapar ya Light Keeping aapko aayega WhatsApp pe primary number pe jo ki aapke father paas hai shayad, right? Toh aap choose kar lijiyega apne accordingly. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, ab aap ek bari Surender ji ko phone de dijiye toh main baat kar leti hu. Baki iske regarding main aapse, aap jaise hi free hote hai, main aapse connect karungi. Hai na? Ji.
Customer: Ji, ji.

Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, abhi voice aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, abhi voice aa rahi hai na mam?
Customer: Ji ji aa rahi hai madam.
Executive: Ji ji ji, toh main aapko ek bari link share kar rahi hu. Aap join kar lijiye mam, haan.
Customer: Theek hai, share kar dijiye.
Executive: Aapka WhatsApp number kaunsa hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, WhatsApp number bata dijiye please apna.

Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sorry sir, hello. Mam number note karna. Haan jaldi bata dijiye aap apna number. 887
Customer: 887
Customer: 248
Executive: 248
Customer: 28
Executive: 28
Customer: 159
Executive: 159
Customer: 15
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: 15
Executive: 15. Main aapko link share karti hu is WhatsApp number pe, aap connect kariye please.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a concern open.

- Customer needs guidance on catalog.

- Customer needs to choose accounting app.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the concern.

- Executive offered guidance on catalog.

- Executive informed about accounting app selection.

- Executive shared link to connect on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- concern, catalog, accounting app, whatsapp

seller_categories.mcat_name: PVC Coated Chain Link Mesh Fence
